parameter.name: sample1_range
parameter.title: Sample Group 1
parameter.description: A group of Experiments, specified by a range and/or list of columns. The groups MUST both be the same size, as only a balanced test is performed.

parameter.name: sample2_range
parameter.title: Sample Group 2
parameter.description: A group of Experiments, specified by a range and/or list of columns. The groups MUST both be the same size, as only a balanced test is performed.
